title: Eligible hutment dwellers may, at the discretion of the C
clause_text: Eligible hutment dwellers may, at the discretion of the C.E.O., S.R.A., be rehabilitated in-situ as far as possible within the area under consideration for the implementation of the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme. Such rehabilitation shall be governed by the provisions of the said Regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
